input.sentences: the parade was a beautiful testament to their culture .
the beautys rode in the car .
output.sentences: There was once a little girl in a parade.
She dreamed of growing up to be one of the pageant beauties in the parade.
She wanted to see the signs celebrating her achievements.
However, the car she rode in was much smaller than those she had seen in her youth.
So instead, she settled for playing the character of a princess at the side of the road.
